text: Rolan's Curse, known in Japan as is an action adventure video game. It was developed by Sammy and released for the Game Boy in 1990. Sammy released a follow up to Rolan's Curse for the Game Boy in 1992, entitled Rolan's Curse II. ==References== Category:1990 video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Fantasy video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Game Boy games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Rolan's Curse
